News.Title: Ksolves Q3 FY26: 6.6% QoQ Growth, 32.4% EBITDA Margin
News.Summary: Ksolves India reported 6.6% quarter-on-quarter revenue growth to INR42.3 crores in Q3 FY26 with EBITDA margin expanding 194 basis points to 32.4%. Company maintains 20% annual growth target.

News.Title: Ksolves India Cuts Marketing Spend, Maintains EBITDA Guidance
News.Summary: Ksolves India announces reduced spending on events and marketing in coming years with no major events planned to affect EBITDA. New labor code gratuity expenses deemed insignificant for FY26 margin guidance.

News.Title: Ksolves Earns Great Place to Work Certification
News.Summary: Ksolves India Limited receives Great Place to Work certification for January 2026-2027, highlighting its people-first culture built on trust, transparency, and continuous learning with highest scores in justice and workplace safety.

News.Title: Ksolves Partners with Gulf Consulting for GCC Expansion
News.Summary: Ksolves India's subsidiary Kingpin Technology Consultants LLC has entered into a business partnership with Gulf Consulting FZ LLE, UAE to expand software services business in the GCC region and drive revenue growth.

News.Title: Ksolves Allots 8,400 Shares Under ESOP Scheme
News.Summary: Ksolves India Limited has allotted 8,400 equity shares at ₹5 face value to employees under its KSOS-I employee stock option scheme, with shares ranking pari-passu with existing equity.

News.Title: Ksolves Q3FY26 Results: Revenue Up 10.6% YoY
News.Summary: Ksolves India reported Q3FY26 revenue of ₹4,147.57 cr, up 10.6% YoY, with net profit at ₹908.27 cr. Board declared ₹5 interim dividend and approved subsidiary restructuring.

News.Title: Ksolves Board to Consider 3rd Interim Dividend Jan 20
News.Summary: Ksolves India Limited has scheduled a board meeting on January 20, 2026, to recommend the third interim dividend for FY 2025-26, following regulatory compliance requirements.

News.Title: Ksolves India Q3FY26 Earnings Call on Jan 20
News.Summary: Ksolves India Limited has scheduled its Q3FY26 and 9M FY26 earnings conference call for January 20, 2026, at 4:00 PM IST to discuss financial results for the period ended December 31, 2025.

News.Title: Ksolves India Appoints Ernst & Young LLP as Investor Relations Agency
News.Summary: Ksolves India Limited has appointed Ernst & Young LLP as its Investor Relations Agency effective October 17, 2025. The agreement is for providing investor relations consulting services to strengthen the company's investor communication framework and engagement with the investment community. Ernst & Young will assist Ksolves in supporting the company's positioning in India and global capital markets. The parties have no shareholding relationship, and the transaction does not involve any related party arrangements or special rights. Ksolves is a publicly listed software development company that serves clients across Technology, Manufacturing, Services Industry, and BFSI sectors with over 500 in-house technology experts.

News.Title: Ksolves India Sets 20% Revenue Growth Target for FY26
News.Summary: Ksolves India has announced a revenue growth target of 20% for FY26, supported by what the company describes as a strong pipeline. The management projects Rs. 90 crore in revenue for the second half of FY26.

News.Title: Ksolves India Limited Conducts Q2 & H1 FY26 Earnings Call
News.Summary: Ksolves India Limited held its quarterly and half-yearly earnings call on October 15, 2025, at 4:00 PM IST via video/audio conference. The company has made the recording available through a YouTube link and will also publish it on their investor relations website. The earnings call covered the company's Q2 and H1 FY26 performance for stakeholders.

News.Title: Ksolves India Declares Second Interim Dividend of Rs. 5 Per Share for FY 2025-26
News.Summary: Ksolves India Limited's Board of Directors declared a second interim dividend of Rs. 5 per share for financial year 2025-26. The dividend will be paid to equity shareholders whose names appear on the company's register of members as of the record date of October 23, 2025. The dividend will be distributed within the statutory time limit on the company's fully paid-up equity share capital.

News.Title: KSolves India Reports Mixed Q2 Results with Revenue Growth but Declining Profitability
News.Summary: KSolves India announced its Q2 financial results showing revenue growth to 394 million rupees compared to 348 million rupees in the same period last year. However, the company's net profit declined to 84 million rupees from 92 million rupees year-over-year. EBITDA also decreased to 120 million rupees from 132 million rupees, while EBITDA margin compressed to 30.46% from 38.06% in the previous year's corresponding quarter.

News.Title: Ksolves India Re-appoints Two Independent Directors for Five-Year Terms
News.Summary: Ksolves India Limited shareholders approved the re-appointment of two Independent Directors at their 11th Annual General Meeting held on September 27, 2025. Ms. Varsha Choudhry will serve a five-year term from March 1, 2026 to February 28, 2031, while Mr. Varun Sharma will serve from April 26, 2026 to April 25, 2031. Ms. Choudhry is a Chartered Accountant with over 17 years of experience in corporate finance, audits, taxation, and compliance across hospitality, retail, and services sectors. She currently runs her own practice specializing in audits, assurance, GST, and advisory services. Mr. Varun Sharma is an Assistant Professor of Finance at Indiana University's Kelley School of Business, holds a Ph.D. in Finance from London Business School, and is a CFA charter holder. He previously worked as Senior Manager/Associate Director at PwC's Risk Advisory practice in London, providing strategic insights to Fortune 500 banks and financial institutions. Both directors are not debarred from holding directorship positions and will not be liable to retire by rotation.

News.Title: Ksolves India Limited Wins 'Odoo Best Partner-2025, India' Award
News.Summary: Ksolves India Limited received the 'Odoo Best Partner-2025, India' award at Odoo Experience 2025 in Brussels, Belgium on September 20, 2025. The recognition acknowledges the company's excellence in delivering innovative Odoo ERP solutions globally. Ksolves is described as a globally recognized Odoo development company and Official Odoo Gold Partner. The award evaluation was based on multiple factors including volume and complexity of successful Odoo ERP implementations, technical proficiency and innovation in ERP development, customer satisfaction and long-term engagement, quality of contributions to the Odoo App Store, and sustained business growth with Odoo solutions. The company provides full-cycle Odoo services including consultation, implementation, customization, integration, migration, and post-deployment support, with operations across 80+ countries and 50+ industries serving startups, SMBs, and enterprises.

News.Title: Ksolves India Re-appoints Two Independent Directors for 5-Year Terms
News.Summary: Ksolves India Limited's Board of Directors approved the re-appointment of Ms. Varsha Choudhry and Mr. Varun Sharma as Non-Executive Independent Directors for 5-year terms. Choudhry's appointment becomes effective March 1, 2026, while Sharma's takes effect April 26, 2026. Both appointments require shareholder approval at the Annual General Meeting scheduled for September 27, 2025. The company trades on BSE under scrip code 543599 and on NSE under symbol KSOLVES.

News.Title: Ksolves India Reports 19.3% YoY Revenue Growth in Q1 FY26, Declares ₹1 Interim Dividend
News.Summary: Ksolves India Limited reported revenue growth of 19.3% year-on-year and 13% quarter-on-quarter for Q1 FY26. The company achieved an operating margin of 26.4% and PAT margin of 17.1%. The Board declared an interim dividend of ₹1 per share. The company celebrated five years of listing with market capitalization growing 5,780% since listing. Management highlighted strategic investments of ₹3.83 crores in ESOP expenses (₹66 lakhs), leadership hiring (₹1.24 crores), and events/market presence (₹1.93 crores) which impacted margins compared to the previous year's 38.06% EBITDA margin. Top 5 customers contribute 42% of revenue while top 10 contribute 58%. The company remains debt-free and has grown from 100+ employees to 550+ employees over five years. Management discussed transition to larger ticket sizes, with deals now ranging up to $600,000 and project durations extending to 15 months. The DFM product has secured a second client with approximately 10 customers in the pipeline. AI/ML collectively contributes around 10-11% of total revenue. Management indicated future focus on buybacks over dividends and expects event costs to reduce to under ₹50 lakhs per quarter from Q4 onwards.

News.Title: Ksolves India Limited Conducts Q1 FY26 Earnings Call
News.Summary: Ksolves India Limited held its Q1 FY26 earnings call on July 21, 2025 at 3:00 PM IST via video/audio conference. The company provided an audio/video recording link of the call for stakeholders and made it available on their website. The earnings call was conducted in compliance with SEBI listing regulations.

News.Title: Ksolves India Declares 3rd Interim Dividend of 7.50 Rupees Per Share
News.Summary: Ksolves India has announced its third interim dividend for the fiscal year. The company has declared a dividend of 7.50 rupees per share to be distributed to its shareholders.

News.Title: Ksolves India Declares Third Interim Dividend
News.Summary: Ksolves India has announced a third interim dividend of 7.50 rupees per share for its shareholders.

News.Title: Ksolves India to Consider 3rd Interim Dividend for FY 2024-25
News.Summary: Ksolves India has announced a board meeting scheduled for March 19 to recommend and declare the third interim dividend for the fiscal year 2024-25.

News.Title: Ksolves India to Establish Wholly-Owned Subsidiary in USA
News.Summary: Ksolves India Limited has announced plans to establish a 100% wholly-owned subsidiary in the United States of America. This strategic move suggests the company is looking to expand its operations and presence in the US market.
